Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
OpenCms ships with several predefined content types that are available as resource types. Most of them, your simply use, e.g., container pages. But some of them are of special interest when you set up your site. They provide commonly used functionality.

We survey the content types shipped with OpenCms and possibly of interest when setting up a website.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: OpenCms ships with several predefined content types that are available as resource types. We survey the content types shipped with OpenCms and possibly of interest when setting up a website.
